Record numbers: Argentina : 8 , Bolivia : 4 , Chile : 2 , Ecuador : 2 , Uruguay : 2 ;
total: 18 .

Remarks:
Hypsibius dujardini sensu
lato
is a species complex (
Kaczmarek & Michalczyk 2009 a
) with an apparent global distribution (
McInnes 1994 a
). The taxa within this complex can only be verified by details of claws morphology and other morphometric characters (e.g.
Miller et al. 2005
,
Kaczmarek & Michalczyk 2009 a
).
